nodes.message: Added a tag so the zone trigger would only fire once per scene entry.
Previously stored in Enter, but this is a better approach for when Shawn enters from Darla's Den.

nodes.text: You look ill. What happened to you?
I don't feel so well. I think I might be poisoned by something. I could use your help, please.
I was fighting for my life and barely managed to defeat my opponent. I know I'm not going to make it... I just want to die in your arms...
You aren't going to die just yet. Let me help you.
It's only a flesh wound.
Hmmm... you look unwell. Let me help you.
Thanks, yes. I don't feel well.
You are obviously suffering from some sort of venom. Here, drink this Antidote potion.

nodes.message: Keeping this in a branch, because of screen text.

nodes.text: Thanks, I feel better already.
You need to be careful. I suggest you buy a spare Antidote Potion from the store in case of emergencies.
You look hurt. Let me help you.
Here, drink this potion. It should ease the pain.

nodes.message: Keeping this in a branch, because of screen text.

nodes.text: Thank you, I feel much better now.
If you are going into danger, you really should carry a healing potion in case of emergencies.
You are seriously wounded! Let me help you...

nodes.message: Keeping this in a branch, because of screen text.

nodes.text: There, I got you patched up in time for supper. Go off to the Dining Hall, I'm sure you must be starving now with all the healing you took.
Thanks so much. You really are a life-saver.
Try to take it easy for a few days. You were seriously injured and it will take some time before you recover all your health.

nodes.message: Keeping this in a branch, because of screen text.

nodes.text: There, I've done what I could to help you for now. You should take it easy for a few days to recover.
'tis glad I am to see you on your feet again. I hope you're feeling better today, Shawn. You were in sorry shape the last time I helped you. Please, take better care of yourself.
I will. I promise.
Welcome to the Infirmary. I am Lady Moira Glenshannon, Healer and Paladin Instructor. How is it that I may help you?
Good day to you, Shawn. I hope you are enjoying your lessons and finding your way around the castle now.
Welcome back. It's so nice to see that you are well and healthy. Most of the students who come in here are in need of some First Aid.
A fine afternoon to you, Shawn. Is there something you wanted to speak about today?
I hear that you are responsible for uncovering the school thief. That was well done of you.
'tis a pleasure to see you so hale and hearty, Shawn.
How is it that I can help you today, Mr. O'Conner?
'tis a pleasure to see you so hale and hearty, Shawn. I worry about the risks you and the others are facing, but it's reassuring to know that you are taking care of yourself.
Is there any word about your friend, Joel? I've got the Paladins searching the castle grounds and the city for him, but they've not seen him.
'tis joyful I am to know that your friend Joel is safe and well, much thanks to you.
'tis a grievous thing that your classmate, Joel, was lost to us all. I am sure that he will be missed.
Good afternoon, Shawn. I hope that you are not too disturbed by the ghosts of the Nights of the Dead. The castle ghosts will not harm you.
Be careful as you wander the halls today. The Dire Rats that have invaded the castle can be very dangerous.
As the semester is nearly over, Shawn. I hope that you have enjoyed your studies. So tell me, do you want to be a hero?
Welcome, Shawn.

nodes.message: TODO: Include this in appropriate place.

nodes.text: Shawn, your roommate spoke with me earlier. He said that you told him that I was attracted to him.

It was unkind of you to lie to Aeolus. You gave him false hope that was crushed when I explained that I had no special feelings for him. This put both of us in an unpleasant situation that should never have occurred.
Telling lies, even when told to make another person feel better, are still wrong. They harm both the listener and the teller. Please keep this in mind the next time you think to tell an untruth.

entryPoints.name: Ask Moira for Help With Joel

nodes.text: Lady Moira, I need your help. There's a Wraith in the Catacombs...
A Wraith? Are you all right? Let me take a look at you - did it drain you?
I'm hurt, but that's not why I came to you...
First, we take care of you, then we'll deal with any other problem. Drink this potion.
Now, what is it that you wanted to say to me?
The Wraith - it has Joel trapped behind a magical barrier...
I'm okay... this is about Joel. The Wraith, it has Joel trapped behind a magical barrier...
A Wraith is deadly dangerous. We don't have much time if we're going to save Joel.
I'll have to get my weapon and armor which will take a bit - I'll be meeting you in the Catacombs. You will have to rescue Joel while I force the Wraith to drop the magical barrier.
Hurry now, there's not a moment to waste...
